definition: to sue for peace/to look for a draw (chess)/summation (math.)
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: But we doing a sum over the individual molecular states.
sentences.chinese: 在这里我们是对分子状态的求和。

sentences.english: Argued against king, opposed to cede territory and ask for peace.
sentences.chinese: 曾主张抗金，反对割地求和。

sentences.english: So then we have integrals instead of sums.
sentences.chinese: 那么我们用积分代替求和。

sentences.english: Is equal to the sum over quantum number n1.
So I can factor out all these sums into a factor of sums.
sentences.chinese: 因此这些求和可以分离成单个的因子。

sentences.english: That we can turn the sums into integrals.
sentences.chinese: 以至于我们可以把求和变成积分。

sentences.english: Li Hongzhang was appointed to approach the imperialists and sue for peace.
sentences.chinese: 李鸿章被委派向帝国主义求和。

sentences.english: Finally the formula of extinction coefficient for bound free transition in hot matter with the statistical effec…
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出了热物质中光电消光系数的统计求和公式。

sentences.english: He drew the back of his hand across his nose with a conciliatory air.
sentences.chinese: 他显出一副息事求和的样子，用手背抹了一下鼻子。

sentences.english: In general we would sum over all the available states.
sentences.chinese: 通常对所有可以允许的态进行求和。

sentences.english: Dependencies are automatically recalculated and re-aggregated as the structure is changed.
sentences.chinese: 用于结构的改变链接的数目应重新计算和求和。

sentences.english: He has sued for peace to you.
Soon enough the Sardinians will sue for peace and you will have secured the safety of south France.
sentences.chinese: 很快的萨蒂尼亚将求和，您将已获得法国南部的安全。

sentences.english: In MiNuoSi challenge, Athens to MiNuoSi king peace.
sentences.chinese: 在米诺斯的挑战下，雅典人向米诺斯王求和。

sentences.english: And it would be nice if I could find a sum here.
sentences.chinese: 要是这一项也能写成求和就好了。

sentences.english: So it would be the sum over all energies.
sentences.chinese: 因此是对所有分子能量的求和。

definition: to dispatch an army/to send troops
to enlist enemy or rebel soldiers by offering amnesty/to bring to negotiated surrender
